Row.Text: +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Land Units. Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 100% of its [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength. The first time each Age that a [icon:WAR] War is declared against you, gain an [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER]Army Commander in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital packed with 1 Infantry Unit, 1 Cavalry Unit, 1 Ranged Unit, and 1 Siege Unit, even if those Units have not been unlocked.

[BLIST][LI][B]+1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement [/B]for all [B]Land Units[/B].[LI]Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] [B]Culture [/B]equal to [B]100% [/B]of its [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] [B]Combat Strength[/B].[LI]The first time each Age that a [icon:WAR] [B]War[/B] is declared against you, gain an [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] [B]Army Commander[/B] in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] [B] Capital[/B] packed with [B]1 Infantry Unit, 1 Cavalry Unit, 1 Ranged Unit, and 1 Siege Unit[/B], even if those Units have not been unlocked.[/LIST]
